name: Renoise Tools
tagline: Improving Renoise with lua scripting in every which way
body:
# Renoise Tools by Cas
This project consists of a handful of tools to make operating music making software [Renoise](http://www.renoise.com) easier. Short descriptions for all of these are also available, on my [web page](http://beatcreators.wordpress.com/tools-for-renoise/).

***

### License
All of the code in this repository is released under [WTFPL](http://www.wtfpl.net/about/); you are especially encouraged to (re)use it and learn from it. If you use it for derivative works, you are also encouraged to give me credit as Cas Marrav or point to this [online business card](http://about.me/casmarrav).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
